thread.title: NEW DELHI: Hours after the Akhilesh Yadav camp declared the young CM a
thread.title_full: NEW DELHI: Hours after the Akhilesh Yadav camp declared the young CM a

author: ET Newsdesk
title: NEW DELHI: Hours after the Akhilesh Yadav camp declared the young CM a
text:
NEW DELHI: Hours after the Akhilesh Yadav camp declared the young CM as the chief of Samajwadi Party, party patriarch Mulayam Singh Yadav expelled Ramgopal Yadav from the party for six years. The SP founder also dubbed the national executive meet as “unconstitutional” and the decisions taken in the same as “illegal”.
Coincidentally, Mulayam has not said anything about son Akhilesh who was also in the national convention earlier today. Akhilesh infact was even more vociferous against Shivpal Yadav, his uncle and Uttar Pradesh SP president.
Read Also: Akhilesh claims SP prez post, wants uncle Shiv Pal to step down from party post (http://blogs.economictimes.indiatimes.com/et-news/make-akhilesh-sp-national-prez-expel-amar-singh-and-shiv-pal-from-party-post-ram-gopal-yadav/)
Earlier today, Ram Gopal Yadav held a national convention in Lucknow where Mulayam was made the Marg Darshak, while Shiv Pal Yadav was removed from state party chief post. The party also expelled Amar Singh from the party for fuelling tensions in the party.
This is the second time that Ramgopal has been expelled from the party in as many days.
Mulayam had expelled Ramgopal yesterday along with Akhilesh but later that day brought both of them back to the party fold.
Here is the letter issued by Mulayam Singh Yadav today (image credit: ANI)
